de.fhbielefeld.ifm.util

Class ShareBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhbielefeld.ifm.util.ShareBar

  • public class ShareBar
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains only one method to create a configurable bar from 3 smaller bars.
    Author:
    Dimitri Mantler

    • Method Detail

      • createShareBar

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap createShareBar(android.content.Context con,
                                     float good,
                                     float med,
                                     float bad,
                                     ShareBar.Size size)
        This method creates the Bitmap which contains the 3 sub-bars in one bar. The sum of all three values schouldn't be greater than 100.
        Parameters:
        con - the appcontext
        good - the share of good transportation as percentage
        med - the share of medium transportation as percentage
        bad - the share of bad transportation as percentage
        size - the size of the bar
        Returns:
        the ShareBar
